Tag.markdownDescription:

Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: The type of VPN connection that this customer gateway supports (``ipsec.1``).
Type.markdownDescription:
The type of VPN connection that this customer gateway supports (``ipsec.1``).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

CustomerGatewayId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

IpAddress.description: The IP address for the customer gateway device's outside interface. The address must be static. If ``OutsideIpAddressType`` in your VPN connection options is set to ``PrivateIpv4``, you can use an RFC6598 or RFC1918 private IPv4 address. If ``OutsideIpAddressType`` is set to ``Ipv6``, you can use an IPv6 address.
IpAddress.markdownDescription:
The IP address for the customer gateway device's outside interface. The address must be static. If ``OutsideIpAddressType`` in your VPN connection options is set to ``PrivateIpv4``, you can use an RFC6598 or RFC1918 private IPv4 address. If ``OutsideIpAddressType`` is set to ``Ipv6``, you can use an IPv6 address.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

BgpAsnExtended.description:
For customer gateway devices that support BGP, specify the device's ASN. You must specify either ``BgpAsn`` or ``BgpAsnExtended`` when creating the customer gateway. If the ASN is larger than ``2,147,483,647``, you must use ``BgpAsnExtended``.
 Valid values: ``2,147,483,648`` to ``4,294,967,295``
BgpAsnExtended.markdownDescription:
For customer gateway devices that support BGP, specify the device's ASN. You must specify either ``BgpAsn`` or ``BgpAsnExtended`` when creating the customer gateway. If the ASN is larger than ``2,147,483,647``, you must use ``BgpAsnExtended``.
 Valid values: ``2,147,483,648`` to ``4,294,967,295``

---

Required: No  
Type: Number  
Update requires: Replacement

BgpAsn.description:
For customer gateway devices that support BGP, specify the device's ASN. You must specify either ``BgpAsn`` or ``BgpAsnExtended`` when creating the customer gateway. If the ASN is larger than ``2,147,483,647``, you must use ``BgpAsnExtended``.
 Default: 65000
 Valid values: ``1`` to ``2,147,483,647``
BgpAsn.markdownDescription:
For customer gateway devices that support BGP, specify the device's ASN. You must specify either ``BgpAsn`` or ``BgpAsnExtended`` when creating the customer gateway. If the ASN is larger than ``2,147,483,647``, you must use ``BgpAsnExtended``.
 Default: 65000
 Valid values: ``1`` to ``2,147,483,647``

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

CertificateArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the customer gateway certificate.
CertificateArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the customer gateway certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:acm:[a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso([a-z]{1})?))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:\d{12}:certificate\/[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$  
Update requires: Replacement
